review_data.title: Fantastic Japanese Dining
review_data.content: Awesome food served by friendly people. What could you ask more? We had some Japanese Tapas, Sushi and a few warm meals. All of them delicious, for a reasonable price.

review_data.title: Very authentic and delicious Japanese food
review_data.content: Great and very authentic Japanese take-away food for very reasonable prices. We enjoyed a delicious and well-balanced sushi plate with crispy tempura, perfectly seasoned gomaae and agedashi dofu. Will certainly order again.

review_data.title: Best sushi in town - also
review_data.content: Best sushi in town - also during Covid while only Take Away is possible. The prices are fair, the quality is exceptional and the service is always friendly.

review_data.title: Best sushis in Zürich
review_data.content: Good atmosphere, nice terrace outside, service can be slow on busy evening and pries are quite high but it totally worth it! My favorite sushis place in Zürich.

review_data.title: Amazing Poke Bowls
review_data.content: The best Poke Bowl I have ever tried. Outstanding service of the waitress. I will surely repeat this restaurant during my next trip to Zurich.

review_data.title: Super Place in Zürich
review_data.content: Owner is a grat guy! From service to the food everything was great! Food delicious and the stuff friendly! If you like asian food, visit this place! Sushi was amazing!
